vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to seek out, swell, cause to swell, boil up, enquire
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to seek, enquire
1a2) to cause to boil up
1b) (Niphal)
1b1) to be searched out
1b2) to be swelling, bulging, swelling out
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   hacer hervir; (b)   inquirir; (c) nif.   hincharse, elevarse; (d)   ser saqueado
